getActingCreature

public Creature getActingCreature()
Description copied from class: Creature
For summons it will return summon object and for
servants - player object.
Used to find attackable target for npcs.

Overrides:
getActingCreature in class Creature
Returns:
acting master - player in case of servants

getMaster

public Creature getMaster()
Description copied from class: Creature
For summons and different kind of servants
it will return currently acting player.
This method is used for duel and enemy relations,
rewards

Overrides:
getMaster in class Creature
Returns:
Master of this creature or self
